assignments.name: chatInput
assignments.value: =Hello, below are some basic market data for Bonk Coin. Please write a short and professional analysis based on these data.  Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleString("tr-TR", { timeZone: "Europe/Istanbul", hour12: false }).replace(",", "") }}  Coin: {{ $json.name }} ({{ $json.symbol }})  Price: {{ $json.current_price }} 24h High: {{ $json.high_24h }} 24h Low: {{ $json.low_24h }} 24h Change: {{ $json.price_change_percentage_24h }} Volume: {{ $json.total_volume }}  ATH: {{ $json.ath }} ATH Change: {{ $json.ath_change_percentage }}%  ATL: {{ $json.atl }} ATL Change: {{ $json.atl_change_percentage }}%  Supply (circulating / total / max): {{ $json.circulating_supply }} / {{ $json.total_supply }} / {{ $json.max_supply }}  Please analyze with short and clear sentences under the following headings:  - Price status and volatility - Liquidity and volume commentary - General investor interest - Risk/opportunity - General judgment (Positive / Negative / Neutral)  Last sentence: one-sentence recommendation for investors (can use appropriate emojis without exaggeration).  Intro example: Hello, the {{ new Date().toLocaleString("tr-TR", { timeZone: "Europe/Istanbul", hour12: false }).replace(",", "") }} analysis for {{ $json.name }} is as follows.
